value.title: CRUSHING requirements with Small Multiples in Power BI

value.title: Handling deletes within Incremental Refresh in Power BI

Patrick has a great technique you can use to not only handle deletes, but also more easily handle updates with your partitions. You should take care to make sure this is where the majority of users you are before anyone signs up for Office 365, Power BI or other Microsoft

This feature was introduced in the February 2018 release of Power BI Desktop. Mark as Date Table has been available

This includes PowerApps, Microsoft Flow, Azure Analysis Services and more. The entire Power Platform!   If you found this video helpful, we have a free cheat sheet for you for more

value.excerpt: In this video, Patrick and Kalyn look at data silos and how to prevent it using Power BI. Different options exist, such as Analysis Services, Azure Analysis Services or models hosted in the Power BI service.  LET'S CONNECT!
